page.title: 18 PERFECT PARTNERS.
page.content:
Perfect Partners is on Sandling Road. It sells wines, cheeses, spirits, cold meats, tinned food, fresh bread, cakes and biscuits. The fresh bread is baked by Mr. Addington. They sell lots of dairy products including over 200 types of cheese. They do outside catering for one person or for one thousand people. They are open seven days a week and have half-day closing on Monday and Wednesday. They plan to expand and to do more outside catering.
You can have coffee while you choose your wine and taste it before you buy it.
